name: GEMZ
description:
GEMZ is a typical top down arcade game you would see, however with the increasing difficulty per level, players will find it much more difficult to complete than expected! With 8 unique levels, and an increase in enemies per level, will you be able to get your slime through to the end?

Controls:

GEMZ features very simple controls, using only WASD to navigate your slime. The "esc" button will bring up the menu page.

Features:

  • Collect gems!
  • Avoid enemies

Contact:

This game is now free to play!
